manage_wallets.wallet_name_reached_a_limit_of_20_charac: Wallet name reached a limit of 20 characters
manage_wallets.description_delete_wallet: If you have any tokens left on this wallet, you should memorize the seed phrase or your asset could be lost permanently!

cloud_backup.cloud_backup_description: Navara Wallet allows you to secure backup your encrypted wallet to your cloud drive. So you don’t have to worry forgot seed phrases or lost your devices.

import_seedphrase.description_your_seed_phrase: Write down or copy these words in the right order and save them somewhere safe. Please dont screenshot or paste clipboard to other apps that you can’t trust. Many apps have the ability to read your seed phrase from that.
import_seedphrase.description_backup_your_wallet: Write down or copy these words in the right order and save them somewhere safe. Please dont screenshot or paste clipboard to other apps that you can’t trust. Many app haves ability to read your seedphrase from that.
import_seedphrase.description_first: Your seed phrase is used to generate and recover your wallet.
import_seedphrase.description_second: It’s more user-friendly, human-readable and even secure (in practice) than primitive private-key- only solutions.
import_seedphrase.description_third: Just with one suite of seed phrase, you can access all blockchains and create multiple accounts.
import_seedphrase.description_import_your_wallet: entering your 12 or 24 words seed phrase
import_seedphrase.description_seed_phrase: or scan with QR code from other wallets
import_seedphrase.label_first: I understand that if I lose or reveal my secret phrase, my cryptocurrency will be lost forever
import_seedphrase.label_second: I understand that I am solely responsible for ensuring the safety and confidentiality of my secret phrase
import_seedphrase.label_third: I agree with Navara's security & privacy policy
import_seedphrase.description_secret_seedphrase: Next step, you will see the secret phrase (12 words) that will help you to recover your wallet
import_seedphrase.label_secret_seedphrase_first: I understand that if I lose or reveal my secret phrase, my cryptocurrency will be lost forever
import_seedphrase.label_secret_seedphrase_second: I understand that if I disclose or share my secret phrase, my cryptocurrency may be stolen
import_seedphrase.label_secret_seedphrase_third: I understand that I am solely responsible for ensuring the safety and confidentiality of my secret phrase
